titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13785

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart Dr.

row.cell: For Services rendered in assisting the organization of the Militia of the State during the time from the Sixteenth of May until June 1st 1864

body.p: The Quarter Master Genl. is ordered to pay this account out of the Militia fund
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspectorl Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31 of May, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of forty One Dollars and Sixty Six Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart Dr.

row.cell: For services rendered in assisting the organization of the Militia of the State during the time from the Sixteenth May until June 1st 1864

body.p: The Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this acct. out of the Militia fund
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspectorl Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of May, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of forty one Dollars and Sixty Six Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
William Stewart
Dollars 41. 66/100
Paid May 31st, 1864
(7)
